I’m trying MCT supplements..haven’t seen the effects yet..

Six months into my ketogenic diet, I’m trying out a little bit of variation on how I adapt myself moving forward… One of them is taking MCTs or medium chain triglicerides where I believe are unique combination of nutrients that are well absorbed by the brain.
